componentId.description: The ID of the component. The component ID is available by querying the Component Metadata object.

componentName.description: The user-defined name given to the component.

componentType.description: The type of component. >**Note:** Currently, this object retrieves Cross Reference Table type-components ('crossref') only.

environmentMapExtensionId.description: The ID of the environment map extension. To find the environmentMapExtensionId, you can first query the [Environment Map Extension object](/api/platformapi#tag/EnvironmentMapExtension) to retrieve a list of all available environment extensions for an account and copy the resultant environment map extension ID.
